Admin Documentation¶

class todolist.admin.TaskAdmin(model, admin_site)[source]¶

Bases: ModelAdmin

Custom admin class for managing Task model in the Django admin site.

This class allows the Task model to be managed with additional configurations in the Django admin interface. Administrators can add, edit, delete, and view tasks.
